input: Batch process requests to retrieve all lock requests and specific event codes.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequestEventSpecifications?$select=EventCode,EventName HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContractLockRequests?$select=ID,EventCode HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--
